      @PostMapping("/addSalon") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView addNewSalon​(@RequestParam java.lang.String name, @RequestParam java.lang.String number, @RequestParam java.lang.String street)
      Post method that inserts into database the new salon with the specified fields by the provider
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the beauty salon
      number - the street number of the beauty salon
      street - the street of the beauty salon
